resources.string:
"Turn 'ON' the switch on the top right. ↗️⊙.⊙↗️ With accessibility authorization, you'll get the best typing experience on different apps!
Note: You may receive a system reminder about authorizing, RainbowKey will NEVER collect ANY of your information."
Meu teclado personalizado feito com o #%1$s http://rainbowkey.com
Customize your own keyboard with your favorite pictures! Download #%1$s For Free: http://rainbowkey.com
Você precisa experimentar o app #%1$s. Você pode personalizar seu teclado com suas próprias fotos! E as ⒻⓄⓃⓉⓈ e os emojis são incríveis. Baixe o #%2$s agora grátis: http://rainbowkey.com"
